intro.title:
Less Screentime
more play
intro.text:
Meet the Avakai family.
A couple of beautiful designed wooden toys that are intuitive, playful and connective to eachother and the world.

features.title: Freedom to play with incredible features
features.intro: The avakai family is a real piece of craftmanship. Itâ€™s build from FSC wood and the inside is packed with real cool and playful techniques. So not only the senses but also the imagination of your child will be stimulated. Here are some examples of what the Avakai can do.

quote.text:
Avakai stimulate the senses and the imagination of children.
With Avakai your kids never leave the playground!

mentions.text: Toys of the Future: Vai Kai Launches a Connected Device for Kids
Built using traditional craftsmanship, Avakai's wooden dolls let children explore interconnectivity
Classic Wooden Dolls Are Tech Toys That Augment Real-World Play
